description.title: Submission
description.detail: A submission contains submission actions to be performed by the storage. A submission can add more objects to the storage, update already submitted objects or make objects publicly available.

description.title: Study
description.detail: A study groups together data submitted to the storage. A study accession is typically used when citing data submitted to ENA. Note that all associated data and other objects are made public when the study is released.

description.title: Project
description.detail: A project groups together data submitted to the storage. A project accession is typically used when citing data submitted to ENA. Note that all associated data and other objects are made public when the project is released.

description.title: Sample
description.detail: A sample contains information about the sequenced source material. Samples are typically associated with checklists, which define the fields used to annotate the samples.

description.title: Experiment
description.detail: An experiment contain information about a sequencing experiment including library and instrument details.

description.title: Run
description.detail: A run is part of an experiment and refers to data files containing sequence reads.

description.title: Analysis
description.detail: An analysis contains secondary analysis results derived from sequence reads (e.g. a genome assembly),

description.title: DAC
description.detail: An European Genome-phenome Archive (EGA) data access committee (DAC) is required for authorized access submissions.

description.title: Policy
description.detail: An European Genome-phenome Archive (EGA) data access policy is required for authorized access submissions.

description.title: Dataset
description.detail: An European Genome-phenome Archive (EGA) data set is required for authorized access submissions.

description.title: Datacite DOI schema
description.detail: Derived from the DataCite Metadata Schema which is a list of core metadata properties chosen for an accurate and consistent identification of a resource for citation and retrieval purposes, along with recommended use instructions. We only work with a subset of them for this schema.

description.title: Bigpicture Dataset
description.detail: A Bigpicture dataset.

description.title: Bigpicture Image
description.detail: A Bigpicture image object captures image objects.

description.title: Bigpicture Sample
description.detail: A Bigpicture sample object.

description.title: Bigpicture Staining
description.detail: Describes stains used for a slide. Can be referencesd. Stains are either defined by procedure information or a list of stains.

description.title: Bigpicture Observation
description.detail: An observation object captures observation objects.

description.title: Bigpicture Observer
description.detail: A BP observer object describes the observer that has performed an observation.

description.title: Bigpicture REMS
description.detail: A container of rems objects.

description.title: Bigpicture Organisation
description.detail: An organisation object contains information about the submitter of a dataset.

description.title: Bigpicture Policy
description.detail: A policy object contains information about the terms of use for a dataset.

description.title: Bigpicture Landing page
description.detail: A landing page object contains the public information visible on a landing page for a dataset.
